channel.title: Please help with making shops
channel.description:
hi when ever i try to make a shop i get this in runserver.bat
[code]Godz-Pk By Laz3r : is ONLINE ! Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "1 3 Silab_Item_Shop" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:115) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:30)[/code]
Can anyone help me?

item.title: Please help with making shops
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

you made a shop, right? did you make sure to press a [tab] button after every number

Read full topic
